# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(blockstore-libs-rdma)
target_link_libraries(blockstore-libs-rdma PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  blockstore-libs-diagnostics
  blockstore-libs-service
  core-libs-common
  core-libs-diagnostics
  cpp-monlib-dynamic_counters
  cpp-threading-future
  contrib-libs-ibdrv
  contrib-libs-protobuf
  cpp-deprecated-atomic
)
target_sources(blockstore-libs-rdma PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/libs/rdma/buffer.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/libs/rdma/client.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/libs/rdma/error.cpp
